member.name: T:Qhta.UndoManager.ActionGroup
member.summary: Specialized action group for managing a collection of actions.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.ActionGroup.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes all actions in the group with the provided arguments.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.ActionGroup.Undo(System.Object)
member.summary: Undoes all actions in the group in the backward direction.

member.summary: Arguments for changing a property.

member.summary: Arguments for changing a property.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyArgs.Target
member.summary: Target object

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyArgs.PropertyName
member.summary: Name of the changed property

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyArgs.OldValue
member.summary: Old value of the property

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyArgs.NewValue
member.summary: New value of the property

member.name: T:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyAction
member.summary: Action for changing a property.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyAction.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the action to change a property.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.ChangePropertyAction.Undo(System.Object)
member.summary: Undoes the action to change a property, restoring the old value.

member.name: T:Qhta.UndoManager.IAction
member.summary: Interface for actions that can be executed with arguments.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.IAction.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the action with the provided arguments.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.IAction.Undo(System.Object)
member.summary: Undoes the action with the provided arguments, restoring the previous state.

member.name: T:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr
member.summary: Manager class for Undo/Redo functionality in application. Records actions and manages undo/redo stacks. Only registered actions can be undone or redone.

member.name: F:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.UndoStack
member.summary: Undo stack to keep track of executed actions for undo functionality.

member.name: F:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.RedoStack
member.summary: Redo stack to keep track of undone actions for redo functionality.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.Enabled
member.summary: Determines whether the Record/Undo/Redo functionality is enabled.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsUndoing
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the application is currently undoing an action.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsRedoing
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the application is currently redoing an action.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsRecording
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the application is currently recording an action.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsGrouping
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the application is currently recording a group of actions;

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsUndoAvailable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the Undo functionality is available.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsRedoAvailable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the Redo functionality is available.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsRecordingAvailable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the recording functionality is available.

member.name: P:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.IsGroupingAvailable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the grouping functionality is available.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.Record(Qhta.UndoManager.IAction,System.Object)
member.summary: Records an action with its arguments for undo functionality.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.Undo
member.summary: Reverts the last operation performed, if undo is available.
member.remarks: This method checks if undo functionality is enabled and if there is an operation available to undo. If both conditions are met, it executes the undo operation and prepares the operation for potential redo.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.Redo
member.summary: Re-executes the last undone action if redo is available.
member.remarks: This method checks if redo operations are enabled, and then it executes the action and updates the undo and redo stacks accordingly.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.StartGrouping
member.summary: Starts recording a group of actions.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoMgr.StopGrouping
member.summary: Starts recording a group of actions.

member.name: T:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoRedoEntry
member.summary: Entry record for storing action and its arguments in the undo/redo stacks.

member.name: M:Qhta.UndoManager.UndoRedoEntry.#ctor(Qhta.UndoManager.IAction,System.Object)
member.summary: Entry record for storing action and its arguments in the undo/redo stacks.
